Package org.apache.fop.image.analyser

Image analyzers for determining the format of an image and to preload its intrinsic size.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ImageReader ImageReader objects read image headers to determine the image size.
XMLReader.Converter This interface is to be implemented for XML to image converters.
 

Class Summary
BMPReader ImageReader object for BMP image type.
EMFReader ImageReader object for EMF image type.
EPSReader ImageReader object for EPS document image type.
GIFReader ImageReader object for GIF image type.
ImageReaderFactory Factory for ImageReader objects.
JPEGReader ImageReader object for JPEG image type.
PNGReader ImageReader object for PNG image type.
SVGReader ImageReader object for SVG document image type.
TIFFReader ImageReader object for TIFF image type.
XMLReader ImageReader object for XML document image type.
 

Package org.apache.fop.image.analyser Description

Image analyzers for determining the format of an image and to preload its intrinsic size.
